name: Covisint
overview:
Covisint provides the leading cloud engagement platform for creating and enabling new mission-critical external business processes. Our solutions enable organizations to connect, engage, and collaborate with the critical external audiences that define their success – including customers, business partners, and suppliers. Covisint enables its customers to establish the kind of secure, reliable, integrated and engaging information experiences that people everywhere have come to expect. Covisint integrates data from various sources – no matter where the data resides – to provide people with the right information, at the right time, and on the technology of their choosing, including any mobile device (smartphone or tablet) on the market. Compared to traditional, time-consuming IT development initiatives, Covisint’s cloud-based model enables our customers to move with speed and agility to transform their businesses by creating innovative new business models. In many cases, these new mission-critical external business processes don’t just support the business – they are the business. The Covisint platform:

Enables business agility and speed; Reduces cost and time-to-implementation; Scalable and repeatable; Meets stringent regulatory compliance requirements; Provides the tools for securely and reliably enabling the flow of critical information; Built on a 500-million-dollar investment in cloud-based technology; Leveraged by the most-demanding enterprises; 500+ global customers, with more than 22 million users, processing over 1 billion transactions per year; Very reliable and proven…with nearly 100% availability or up-time, and virtually 100% customer retention. The Covisint platform was developed on an initial 500-million-dollar investment to connect the global automotive industry and has been continually modernized to solve current business problems organizations are facing today. Businesses in virtually every industry face similar challenges in connecting with external audiences – securely, reliably and with near seamless collaboration across the entire communication chain. The Covisint platform is designed to meet these challenges. Evidence of our success can be found in the fact that we have referenceable implementations in every industry in which we do business today.
